```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(palmerpenguins))

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

# Clean the data to remove NAs
penguins_clean <- penguins %>%
  drop_na(flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, species)

# Create the plot without messages
ggplot(penguins_clean, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = species)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, linetype = "dashed", linewidth = 1.2) +
  labs(
    title = "Prnguin Flipper Length vs Body Mass",
    subtitle = "Species comparison from Palmer Station, Antarctica",
    x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
    y = "Body Mass (g)",
    color = "Species"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
```
